note.title: Note to Readers
note.t: Discussion of this document takes place on the LAMPS Working Group mailing list (lamps@ietf.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/lamps/.
Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/cpu/draft-ietf-lamps-8410-ku-clarifications.
